short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Favorite, Bookmark & Mark link as Read in Github

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are a lot of links provided on Github pages. Some might need to be marked as read, some might be amazing & some you would love to read it later. Github Marker does exactly that.
The extension provides 3 options attached to every link found on Github related pages/URLs:
1. Mark as Read/Unread
2. Favorite/Un-Favorite a link
3. Bookmark/Unbookmark a link
